tool.name: Complete Reactions
tool.description: Completes mono-component reactions output by RetroPath2.0 with the appropriate cofactors

regex.description: The sink file is empty or not found

tool.command: #if str($sink.cond) == 'empty' echo '"Name","InChI"' > empty_sink.csv && #set sinkfile='empty_sink.csv' #else #set sinkfile=$sink.sinkfile #end if python -m rptools.rpcompletion '$rp2_pathways' $sinkfile '$rp2paths_compounds' '$rp2paths_pathways' completed_pathways --upper_flux_bound '$adv.upper_flux_bound' --lower_flux_bound '$adv.lower_flux_bound' --max_subpaths_filter '$adv.max_subpaths_filter' --chemical-space '$adv.chemical_space' #if $adv.cofile --cofactors '$adv.cofile' #end if #if not $sink.error_codes --silent #end if

param.name: sinkfile
param.label: Sink File
param.help: Sink file which comprises all compounds that are considered as granted in your system.

param.label: Max subpaths generated per pathway
param.help: Maximal number of subpaths to be created per master pathway.

param.label: Upper flux bound
param.help: Upper flux bound value to be used in outputted SBML models (fbc SBML package) for new reactions created.

param.label: Lower flux bound
param.help: Lower flux bound value to be used in outputted SBML models (fbc SBML package) for new reactions created.

tool.help:
rpCompletion ============
Completes mono-component reactions output by `RetroPath2.0 <https://www.doi.org/10.1016/j.ymben.2017.12.002>`_ with the appropriate cofactors. Creates sub-paths when multiple reaction rules are associated with a single reaction. Input is a single pathways file produced by RP2Paths. It stands on rpCache which store pre-computed data.
Output ------
* **pathways**: SBML completed pathways
